snippet: The floods, which killed scores of people and submerged vast areas of farmland, renewed concerns about North Korea’s ability to feed its people.
lead_paragraph: The floods, which killed scores of people and submerged vast areas of farmland, renewed concerns about North Korea’s ability to feed its people.

headline.main: North Korea: Food Aid Urgently Needed, U.N. Says
headline.print_headline: North Korea: Food Aid Urgently Needed, U.N. Says
